original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2)
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya

original: 14.1. Hetuduka
analyzed: hetu duka

original: Hetu
analyzed: hetu

original: Namo tassa Bhagavato Arahato Sammāsambuddhassa.
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sampayuttakā
analyzed: hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā a hetum dhammam paṭicca sampayuttakā

original: khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṁ; paṭisandhikkhaṇe …pe… hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu
analyzed: khandhā citta samuṭṭhānam ca rūpa paṭisandhi kkhaṇe pe hetum dhammam paṭicca na na hetu

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca na na hetu ca dhammā

original: uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: na hetum dhammam paṭicca na na hetu dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum dhammam paṭicca

original: nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na hetum dhammam paṭicca na hetu ca na na hetu ca

original: dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
analyzed: dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā

original: Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñca nahetuñca
analyzed: hetum ca na hetum ca dhammam paṭicca na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca na hetuñca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuñca nahetuñca dhammaṁ
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na na hetu dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuñca na hetuñca dhamma

original: paṭicca nahetu ca nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: paṭicca na hetu ca na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava …pe… avigate nava. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe nava pe avigate nava sahajāta vārampi pe sampayutta vārampi paṭicca vāra sadisa

original: Hetu-ārammaṇa
analyzed: hetu ārammaṇa

original: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa dhammassa hetu paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: hetu dhammaḥ na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Nahetu dhammo nanahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi.
analyzed: na hetu dhammaḥ na na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetu ca nahetu ca dhammā nahetussa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: hetu ca na hetu ca dhammā na hetussa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ tīṇi

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava …pe… upanissaye nava, purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe nava pe upanissaye nava purejāte pacchājāte tīṇi āsevane

original: nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge sampayutte
analyzed: nava kamme tīṇi vipāke nava āhāre tīṇi indriye nava jhāne tīṇi magge sampayutte

original: nava, vippayutte pañca …pe… avigate nava. (Pañhāvārampi evaṁ vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: nava vippayutte pañca pe avigate nava pañhāvāram pi evam vitthāretabba
